```{r}
# Load libraries
library(readxl)
library(tseries)
library(forecast)
```
```{r}
# Read data
coffee_data <- read_excel("G:\\R files\\Coffee Sales Data Clean.xlsx")
sales_ts <- ts(coffee_data$Sales, frequency = 12, start = c(1,1))
```

```{r}
# 1. Fit ARIMA model
arima_model <- auto.arima(sales_ts)
summary(arima_model)
```

```{r}
# 2. Residual Analysis
checkresiduals(arima_model)
```

```{r}
# 3. Forecast for next 5 periods
forecast_result <- forecast(arima_model, h = 5)
plot(forecast_result, main = "Coffee Sales Forecast", 
     xlab = "Time Period", ylab = "Sales")
```

```{r}
# 4. Model Accuracy
accuracy(forecast_result)
```
